articles.title: Brutal Year for Stock Picking Spurs Trillion-Dollar Fund Exodus - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The last thing a diversified fund manager wants is to run a portfolio dominated by just seven technology companies — all American, all megacap, clustered in the same corner of the economy. Yet as the S&P 500 pushed to fresh records this week, investors were a…
